name: Herbsventure
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure with Herb the Frog in 'Herbsventure'! The Bee Queen's children have been kidnapped by the notorious Pixelrat, and it's up to Herb to save them. Along the way, Herb must navigate through treacherous obstacles and collect the Queen's stolen honeycombs. Join Herb in his mission to save the Bee Queen's children and bring the evil Pixelrat to justice.

The game is designed to be short and sweet, perfect for players who want to experience a fun adventure in a limited amount of time. With easy-to-learn controls and challenging obstacles, 'Herbsventure' is suitable for players of all skill levels.

'Herbsventure' is a captivating 2D platformer game that takes you on an unforgettable adventure! You can play 'Herbsventure' with Mouse and Keyboard or Controllers on any Windows PC.

Developed by:

Justus Nacken, Milan Hösl and Nanda Kater
